TopicTitle: Advances Rocket manufacturing... I dont know how to call this.

Articles.Content:
Have you People seen this?

I dont even now how to control my crafts like this.

Honestly, I am very impressed and I wanted to share it with you.
That's some impressive piloting..
Wow, I remember i have tried this before but i am very bad at piloting so it didn't go very well.
Seriously impressed. Bravo, good pilot.
I was half expecting him to use the ship he built to make a third ship on Gilly xD
I am blown away...
Good craft design and good input hardware make flying like that a whole lot easier. I can't do that in KSP, but I've done similar manoeuvres in VTOL/helicopter based sims.

I'm speechless.

-Will
We have some extremely talented individuals in this community. Kudos dude
this is the guy that pilots whackjobs ships!
That is some totally rad flying. Love the blooper reel at the end, surprised there weren't more. Makes me want to hook up my joystick.
The was done buy Cupcake youtube
I can't even do that with Mechjeb. I'm impressed.
That music sounds familiar.. It almost sounds like it's from the SNES doom or something.

The was done buy Cupcake youtube

The same Cupcake that always says "Cupcake..." at the end of their posts?

If so, cool. His/her piloting skills are amazing, and s/he knows how to build good looking ships. Subbed.

I'm so glad we don't have to build rockets like that, I'd never be going anywhere!

I once tried landing something on top of something else on Minmus, and failed miserably. It's exceptionally difficult to do docking with gravity.

The same Cupcake that always says "Cupcake..." at the end of their posts?

If so, cool. His/her piloting skills are amazing, and s/he knows how to build good looking ships. Subbed.

Yes, that Cupcake, who puts all out VTOL skills to shame. Wish I could map my joystick right so could fly like that.

MalfunctionMike, that was the best KSP vid I've ever had the pleasure to watch! You have some serious piloting skills, and I love how creative those VTOL craft were. Not only were those skills inspirational to behold, but the entire video and presentation was top notch! Well done!
thats cupcake for you.. awesome vtol engineer and pilot
Imagine what the guys at the VAB have to do when whackjob is buliding...

MalfunctionMike, that was the best KSP vid I've ever had the pleasure to watch! You have some serious piloting skills, and I love how creative those VTOL craft were. Not only were those skills inspirational to behold, but the entire video and presentation was top notch! Well done!

It is not my Video, Voculus.

I am only the Crawler who digged it up

All Reputation goes to Cupcakes.

Amazing piloting!

Does anyone know how he got all those camera angles? Is it part of KSP or an extra mod?
Cupcake is the builder of the VTOL and the pilot as well.

Does anyone know how he got all those camera angles? Is it part of KSP or an extra mod?

Yes, there's a mod. It's called KerbCam.

Here's the link

<http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24757-0-23-KerbCam-v0-12-(camera-pathing-tool-for-videos)>
Great piloting skills (although the blooper reel shows he did a lot of shooting to get the perfect result) and really nice end product. I like the style of the video a lot.
